ygData.subject: Re: The birth of the nightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: Inside the pod, something began to move. The file had not been totally uploaded, but it was not an essential part. The protoform was now fully awake and knew

Inside the pod, something began to move. The file had not been totally
uploaded, but it was not an essential part. The protoform was now
fully awake and knew what was happening around.

More out of instinct than by real malevolence, it sent a wave of
distress on Darkangel's mind. It could freeze him in place and leave
him shaking, but the effects were variable depending on many factors.
However, it was a disturbing sensation that would likely leave him
restless.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : : 
> He recieved the comm message from Tyrael, and opened a return channel. 
> Darkangel: Understood. I'll begin work on this right away. 
> Darkangel got the pod he had returned with ans set it up in a lab,
connected to the computer system. First he got the black canister and
unloaded it's contents into the pod, so it would be part of the
protoform. That was easy. Now Darkangel was at the keyboards running
through millions of files looking for the correct one. 
> Finally after about ten minutes he found Burrock.dna on the system.
He selected the file and began to upload it into the pod. The computer
said it would take twenty minutes to complete the upload. 
> Darkangel: Ok, I guess I'll be here for a while... 
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Tyrael
opened a frequency with Darkangel.
> 
> Tyrael: Darkangel, this is Tyrael. I want you to create this new bot I
> was talking about, since I can't be there right now. Go into the lab
> with a blank stasis pod and download the Burrock.DNA file in it. Then,
> include the black canister to its composition. Contact me when our new
> soldier is born.
> 
>
